name: Amplifying Touch
description:
Your healing energies empower attacks. An ally that recovers Hit Points from your lay on hands gains a +1 status bonus to their attack rolls and deals 1 additional good damage on all their Strikes until the end of their next turn.Archetype Use

This feat can be used for one or more Archetypes in addition to the listed Classes. When selected this way, the feat is not considered to have its class traits.
